config.sql: SELECT NID,B.SNAME AS SK, FACT_BALANCE AS BALANCE, FACT_A AS ONEYEAR, FACT_B AS TWOYEAR, FACT_C AS THREEYEAR, FACT_D AS FOURYEAR, C.SNAME AS SKXZ,(CASE WHEN ISINSIDE='1' THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) AS SFNB,(CASE WHEN ISNORMAL='1' THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) AS SFZC,D.SNAME AS FZCFL,E.SNAME AS ZWRZK, FACT_E AS KHSJE, FACT_F AS DNKHSJE, FACT_G AS YQZK, FACT_H AS SZXSSJE FROM (SELECT NID,DIM_CUSUPPLIER,DIM_COMPANY,DIM_ITEM,FACT_BALANCE,FACT_A,FACT_B,FACT_C,FACT_D,ISNATURE, ISINSIDE,ISNORMAL,SCONTENTA,SCONTENTB,FACT_E,FACT_F,FACT_G,FACT_H FROM DW_FACTAGEANALYSIS WHERE DIM_COMPANY=:company AND DIM_PERIOD=:period AND DIM_ITEM='1002') A INNER JOIN (SELECT SCODE,SNAME FROM DW_DIMSUPPLIER WHERE SCOMCODE IN('1001',:company)) B ON A.DIM_CUSUPPLIER=B.SCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT SCODE,SNAME FROM DW_DIMDROPMENU WHERE SPCODE='10') C ON A.ISNATURE=C.SCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT SCODE,SNAME FROM DW_DIMDROPMENU WHERE SPCODE='11') D ON A.SCONTENTA=D.SCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT SCODE,SNAME FROM DW_DIMDROPMENU WHERE SPCODE='12') E ON A.SCONTENTB=E.SCODE

config.sql1: WITH NOWYEAR AS(SELECT DIM_COMPANY, ISINSIDE, ISNORMAL, FACT_BALANCE, SCONTENTA, FACT_A, FACT_B, FACT_C, FACT_D, FACT_E, FACT_F, FACT_G, FACT_H FROM DW_FACTAGEANALYSIS WHERE DIM_PERIOD=:period AND DIM_COMPANY IN (SELECT SCODE FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE SPCODE = '1001' AND CISDEL='N') AND DIM_ITEM='1002' AND ISINSIDE IS NOT NULL), LASTYEAR AS (SELECT DIM_COMPANY, ISINSIDE, ISNORMAL, FACT_BALANCE, FACT_A, FACT_B, FACT_C, FACT_D FROM DW_FACTAGEANALYSIS WHERE DIM_PERIOD=:comparePeriod AND DIM_COMPANY IN (SELECT SCODE FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE SPCODE = '1001' AND CISDEL='N') AND DIM_ITEM='1002' AND ISINSIDE IS NOT NULL), AQBL AS (SELECT FACT_A A FROM (SELECT FACT_A, DIM_PERIOD FROM DW_FACTAGEANALYSIS_PERCENT WHERE DIM_COMPANY = :company AND SRATIOTYPE = '1' AND DIM_PERIOD <= :period ORDER BY DIM_PERIOD DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1), YJBL AS (SELECT FACT_A A FROM (SELECT FACT_A, DIM_PERIOD FROM DW_FACTAGEANALYSIS_PERCENT WHERE DIM_COMPANY = :company AND SRATIOTYPE = '2' AND DIM_PERIOD <= :period ORDER BY DIM_PERIOD DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ) SELECT CASE WHEN Q.ISINSIDE='0' OR Q.ISINSIDE='0_合计' THEN Q.DIM_COMPANY ELSE Q.DIM_COMPANY ||Q.ISINSIDE END GSBM , CASE WHEN Q.ISINSIDE='0' OR Q.ISINSIDE='0_合计' THEN Q.DIM_COMPANY ELSE '' END scode , CASE WHEN Q.ISINSIDE='0' THEN Q.GSMC WHEN Q.ISINSIDE='0_合计' THEN '总计' ELSE '' END gsmc , CASE WHEN Q.ISINSIDE='0'or Q.ISINSIDE='0_合计' THEN '外部' WHEN Q.ISINSIDE='1' OR Q.ISINSIDE='1_合计' THEN '内部' WHEN Q.ISINSIDE<>'0' AND Q.ISINSIDE<>'1' AND Q.ISINSIDE<>'0_合计' AND Q.ISINSIDE<>'1_合计' THEN '合计' ELSE Q.ISINSIDE END KJ, CASE WHEN Q.ISINSIDE='0' OR Q.ISINSIDE='0_合计' THEN '' ELSE Q.DIM_COMPANY END AS PID, Q.YE, Q.ZJE, Q.ZJL, Q.RISKRANGE, W.ZCJE, E.FFF1, E.FFF2, E.FFF3, E.FFF4, E.FFF5, E.FFF6, E.FFF7, R.WWW1, R.WWW2, R.WWW3, R.WWW4 FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN GROUPING(A.DIM_COMPANY)=1 THEN '9' ELSE A.DIM_COMPANY END) AS DIM_COMPANY,C.SNAME AS GSMC, (CASE WHEN GROUPING(A.ISINSIDE)=1 AND GROUPING(A.DIM_COMPANY)=0 THEN A.DIM_COMPANY||'_小计' WHEN GROUPING_ID(A.DIM_COMPANY,A.ISINSIDE)=3 THEN '999_合计' WHEN GROUPING(A.ISINSIDE)=0 AND GROUPING(A.DIM_COMPANY)=1 THEN A.ISINSIDE||'_合计' ELSE A.ISINSIDE END) AS ISINSIDE, NVL(SUM(A.FACT_BALANCE),0) AS YE, (NVL(SUM(A.FACT_BALANCE),0)-NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0)) AS ZJE, (CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((NVL(SUM(A.FACT_BALANCE),0)-NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0))/NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0),2) END) AS ZJL, (CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE (NVL(SUM(A.FACT_BALANCE),0)-NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0))/NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0) END) <= NVL( (SELECT A FROM AQBL),0 ) THEN 'SAFE' WHEN (CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE (NVL(SUM(A.FACT_BALANCE),0)-NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0))/NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0) END)>=NVL( (SELECT A FROM YJBL),0) THEN 'DANGER' ELSE 'PROMPT' END ) AS RISKRANGE, (NVL(SUM(A.FACT_A),0)) AS FACT_A,(NVL(SUM(A.FACT_B),0)) AS FACT_B,(NVL(SUM(A.FACT_C),0)) AS FACT_C,(NVL(SUM(A.FACT_D),0)) AS FACT_D FROM NOWYEAR A LEFT JOIN LASTYEAR B ON A.DIM_COMPANY=B.DIM_COMPANY AND A.ISINSIDE=B.ISINSIDE INNER JOIN DW_DIMCOMPANY C ON A.DIM_COMPANY=C.SCODE GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ((A.DIM_COMPANY, C.SNAME, A.ISINSIDE), (A.DIM_COMPANY, C.SNAME), A.ISINSIDE, NULL)) Q LEFT JOIN (SELECT (CASE WHEN GROUPING(DIM_COMPANY)=1 THEN '9' ELSE DIM_COMPANY END) AS DIM_COMPANY, (CASE WHEN GROUPING_ID(DIM_COMPANY,ISINSIDE)=3 THEN '999_合计' WHEN GROUPING(DIM_COMPANY)=0 AND GROUPING(ISINSIDE)=1 THEN DIM_COMPANY||'_小计' ELSE ISINSIDE END) AS ISINSIDE, SUM(NVL(FACT_BALANCE,0)) AS ZCJE FROM NOWYEAR WHERE ISNORMAL='1' AND ISINSIDE='0' GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ((DIM_COMPANY, ISINSIDE), DIM_COMPANY, ISINSIDE, NULL)) W ON Q.DIM_COMPANY=W.DIM_COMPANY AND Q.ISINSIDE=W.ISINSIDE LEFT JOIN (SELECT (CASE WHEN GROUPING(DIM_COMPANY)=1 THEN '9' ELSE DIM_COMPANY END) AS DIM_COMPANY, (CASE WHEN GROUPING_ID(DIM_COMPANY,ISINSIDE)=3 THEN '999_合计' WHEN GROUPING(DIM_COMPANY)=0 AND GROUPING(ISINSIDE)=1 THEN DIM_COMPANY||'_小计' ELSE ISINSIDE END) AS ISINSIDE, SUM((CASE WHEN SCONTENTA='1101' THEN NVL(FACT_BALANCE,0) ELSE 0 END)) AS FFF1, SUM((CASE WHEN SCONTENTA='1102' THEN NVL(FACT_BALANCE,0) ELSE 0 END)) AS FFF2, SUM((CASE WHEN SCONTENTA='1103' THEN NVL(FACT_BALANCE,0) ELSE 0 END)) AS FFF3, SUM((CASE WHEN SCONTENTA='1104' THEN NVL(FACT_BALANCE,0) ELSE 0 END)) AS FFF4, SUM((CASE WHEN SCONTENTA='1105' THEN NVL(FACT_BALANCE,0) ELSE 0 END)) AS FFF5, SUM((CASE WHEN SCONTENTA='1106' THEN NVL(FACT_BALANCE,0) ELSE 0 END)) AS FFF6, SUM((CASE WHEN SCONTENTA='1107' THEN NVL(FACT_BALANCE,0) ELSE 0 END)) AS FFF7 FROM NOWYEAR WHERE ISNORMAL='0' AND ISINSIDE='0' GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ( (DIM_COMPANY, ISINSIDE), DIM_COMPANY, NULL)) E ON Q.DIM_COMPANY=E.DIM_COMPANY AND Q.ISINSIDE=E.ISINSIDE LEFT JOIN (SELECT (CASE WHEN GROUPING(DIM_COMPANY)=1 THEN '9' ELSE DIM_COMPANY END) AS DIM_COMPANY, (CASE WHEN GROUPING_ID(DIM_COMPANY,ISINSIDE)=3 THEN '999_合计' WHEN GROUPING(DIM_COMPANY)=0 AND GROUPING(ISINSIDE)=1 THEN DIM_COMPANY||'_小计' ELSE ISINSIDE END) AS ISINSIDE, SUM(NVL(FACT_E,0)) AS WWW1, SUM(NVL(FACT_F,0)) AS WWW2,SUM(NVL(FACT_G,0)) AS WWW3,SUM(NVL(FACT_H,0)) AS WWW4 FROM NOWYEAR WHERE ISINSIDE='0' GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ((DIM_COMPANY, ISINSIDE), DIM_COMPANY, NULL)) R ON Q.DIM_COMPANY=R.DIM_COMPANY AND Q.ISINSIDE=R.ISINSIDE ORDER BY Q.DIM_COMPANY,Q.ISINSIDE
